@id: URL:  Optional. A URL that resolves to *this* JSON-LD document, NOT the URL of the DigitalDocument that this JSON-LD document describes. To link to the CreativeWork itself, please use 'url' and/or 'identifier')
name: Text: Name or title of the document
description: Text: Description / abstract of the creative work to aid in searching
keywords: Text: Keywords or tags used to describe the CreativeWork.
citation: Text: A textual citation to other work relevant to this CreativeWork

additionalProperty.description: A boolean indicating whether or not the item described by this metadata is a contribution to the Ocean Practices Federated Network (OPFN)

Enter the the type of methodology described, for example standard operating procedure, guide, manual, standard specification, or best practice. For items declared as best practices, please provide 1) a statement of under what circumstances the method is the 'best' choice (in the schema:description field/property) and 2) valid links to documented and publicly available evidence showing how the method performs better than others in the relevant application scenario (in the schema:citations field/property).
Describe how widely this method has been adopted with terms like organisational, multi-organisational, international.
Add keywords to describe the disciplinary area(s) this method is relevant to, ideally using terms from https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P08/current/
value: Text: Keywords or tags used to describe the CreativeWork.

additionalProperty.description: Add keywords for the GOOS Essential Ocean Variables which this method is relevant to, please use the EOV names provided here: https://www.goosocean.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&layout=edit&id=283&Itemid=441
value: Text: Keywords or tags used to describe the CreativeWork.

additionalProperty.propertyID: Sustainable Development Goals, Targets, and Indicators
additionalProperty.description: Add the SDG codes for goals (14), targets (14.1), and/or indicators (14.1.1) which this method is relevant to, please use the codes provided here: https://sdgs.un.org/
Please descript the maturity level of your method with a keyword or phrase. For example, concept, pilot, mature.
Include any bibliographic citation for this record here

about.name: Name of the action
instrument: Text: Keywords or tags used to describe the CreativeWork.
location: Text - which locations are valid for actions supported by this protocol?
object: Text: object on which the action is taken
Text: another object on which the action is taken
about.result: Text: The result of the action - e.g. a DNA sample was generated
